attributes.action: Putting a face to BT Openreach
attributes.additional_details:
To prevent BT Openreach from having a monopoly on service provision. The company can clearly not handle the whole of our country's telecoms network.

To make Openreach directly contactable for end-users (e.g. through the use of a call centre).

To increase Openreach's transparency to consumers and businesses in its service level reporting to industry.
